description: This file defines the main React component 'App' for a Tic Tac Toe frontend application. It sets up game state, handles user interactions on the game board, and integrates a ChatWidget component for chatbot functionality. The component renders the game interface with minimal controls and a placeholder game board.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the Tic Tac Toe game UI and ChatWidget integration.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles click events on game board cells, updates the board state, and toggles the current player.
